title: EastEnders spoilers: Mel makes Ruby a surprising offer
text:
Mel Owen (Tamzin Outhwaite) has been busy getting revenge on the Mitchells in EastEnders and, in the coming episodes, she goes behind business partner Sharon’s (Letitia Dean) back and proceeds to make Ruby Allen (Louisa Lytton) a shock offer. The question is: is it one that she’ll be able to refuse?

Ever since Phil (Steve McFadden) attempted to stop her from arranging Hunter’s funeral, Mel has been hellbent on bringing the Mitchells down, and — since discovering her secret affair with Keanu (Danny Walters) — Sharon has become her primary target.

The Mitchell matriarch has been off in Portugal trying to acquire a villa for her, but — in the coming episodes — she returns home, which makes it the perfect time for Mel to start causing more trouble for her.

Upon Sharon’s return, Mel invites Ruby to E20 and offers her first refusal to buy the club. Ruby’s taken aback, but she senses that Sharon has doubts about selling, and thus she’s not sure how to proceed. However, Mel reassures the young woman that Sharon definitely will be willing to sell — something that she’ll no doubt see to personally, as — later — she threatens Sharon to do as she says.

Later in the week, Ruby discusses Mel’s proposition further, but when she pays Sharon a visit, conflict ensues when the Mitchell matriarch disputes the amount offered on the club.

Will Ruby get the club?

She certainly seems keen, but — with Mel and Sharon’s feud reaching boiling point — what Ruby wants is likely the last thing on either of the Walford icons’ minds.

One to watch: Monday 28th October at 8pm on BBC One.
